rationale: 'so many' contains an intensifier modifying a quantity. 'particularly since' contains an intensifier modifying a conjunction.
statement_text: The mass culling of so many chickens over bird flu impacts food prices. That's [impact on food prices] particularly since 9% of laying hens kept for egg production have been culled, per NHK.

rationale: The phrase 'mass culling' uses an intensifier + negative noun, fitting a Q2 pattern.
statement_text: The mass culling of so many chickens over bird flu impacts food prices. That's [impact on food prices] particularly since 9% of laying hens kept for egg production have been culled, per NHK.
